channel.title: DL client
channel.description: So I zipped my server and cache, uploaded it to mediafire, my friend downloaded it, try to play it, it said error in "main" file so in the GUI I changed the Ip to his, and now when he opens it, it says Opening Client this may take awhile, but it won't open it, what do I do?

item.title: DL client
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Fine.
What rewards? lol

Read full topic

item.title: DL client
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Can someone just tv me and help me with this? Ill give u rewards.

Read full topic

item.title: DL client
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

facepalm
You don’t change the ip to his, you change it your NO-IP one.

For instance, if your no-ip was : b00mz1029.no-ip.biz or something, you’d change it to that.
Then you give him the new client with EVERYTHING in it, (exactly the same as yours, just with the ip changed) run the server, and if you’ve portforwarded, he can connect.

Use youtube. It’s so flippin’ simple. I opened a server up when i was 13, all in about 2 hours. It really isn’t difficult…

Read full topic
